scripts.check-formatting: prettier -c './**/*.cfg' './**/*.ini' './**/*.md' './**/*.toml' './**/*.yml' ./.prettierrc ./.style.yapf && poetry run isort . --check && poetry run yapf -rd instagram_archiver .stubs test
scripts.format: prettier -w './**/*.cfg' './**/*.ini' './**/*.md' './**/*.toml' './**/*.yml' ./.prettierrc ./.style.yapf && poetry run isort . && poetry run yapf -ri instagram_archiver .stubs test
scripts.qa: yarn mypy && yarn pylint && yarn check-spelling && yarn check-formatting
